name: Welcome To Liberty Z
description:
Short  survival FPS located on a well known setting after some major radioactive incident happened years ago. Your goal in this game is to survive as long as possible against hordes upon hordes of radiation victims or also called "ferals". 

Use this opportunity to explore and get to know the effects an artificial catastrophe and the resulting decades of abandonment has on this emblematic location. 

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
DISCLAIMER

This isn´t anything near a finished triple-A title, just a little prototype made by a bunch of students trying to learn what Unity even is.

This game and everything represented in it is purely INSPIRED on real-world locations, this is not meant to be taken seriously nor as an accurate representation of the real world settings.

TEAM BEHIND THE GAME

This game was made in 6 months by Quiryat, Himar and Jafar at Expert in videogame development ULPGC as a finals project. 

Thank you for trying out the game!
